pages.text: $(o)"Watching the Dancer, the King feasts, obviously, in his throne, watching as the world progresses, as bodies decay, and hungers grow. The King feasts on the hunger in the world, and where the King feasts, one might feast with him."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(item)Blood Clot$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Body$() aspect.
The Blood Clot is simply crafted with $(l:lessons/lesson_collection)Body Essence$(), a $(l:vitalis/entry_heart_human)Human Heart$(), and $(l:alchemy/entry_wine)Redmost Wine$()
